title: Interpret the Meaning of h(t)
text: The given h(t) describes the relationship between time (t) and height. At time t, the stone will be h(t) feet above the platform. So finding the maximum height and the time that the stone reach the maximum height is the same as finding the maximum point of the function h(t).

text: Given any parabola in the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, a is called the leading coefficient of the parabola. If a is negative, the parabola opens downward. If a is positive, the parabola opens upward.

text: Given $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, the axis of symmetry for the parabola is $$x=\frac{-b}{2a}$$.
